text: intent: install kg in dev/editable mode and start it in a fresh container

outcome: installed kg editable (uv tool install --editable . from /workspace); kg start ran silently (known rich/pipe behavior); kg.toml sources path corrected from /workspace/kg/kg → /workspace; kg reindex picked up 50 source files; 91 nodes indexed
gotcha: kg status and kg start both ran with zero stdout in this session — may be related to [[sources]] path /workspace/kg/kg not existing; or rich output not rendering in piped bash context
intent: compare useplato/kg fork vs local sasha-s/kg to plan unification

outcome: useplato/kg has only 2 code improvements over its initial commit (shared DB conn in file_indexer + slug null guards in context.py); sasha-s/kg local is far ahead in features; backport is trivial, unification = use sasha-s/kg as canonical with those 2 fixes applied

outcome: useplato/kg has only 2 code improvements over its initial commit (shared DB conn in file_indexer + slug null guards in context.py); sasha-s/kg local is far ahead in features; backport is trivial, unification = use sasha-s/kg as canonical with those 2 fixes applied
intent: set up kg dev environment in fresh container — install editable, start services, fix hooks/MCP

outcome: installed via 'uv tool install --editable .' (CLI) + 'uv run python' (importable); backported 2 fixes from useplato/kg (shared DB conn + slug null guards); set up dual remotes (sasha + plato); cleaned up stale .claude/settings.json hook paths and removed duplicate hooks from global ~/.claude/settings.json
